text: James Edwin "Ed" Worley is a Democratic member of the Kentucky Senate, representing the 34th District since 1999. He is currently Minority Floor Leader. ==External links== *Kentucky Legislature – Senator Ed Worley official government site *Project Vote Smart – Senator James Edwin 'Ed' Worley (KY) profile *Follow the Money – Ed Worley **2008 2006 2004 2002 2000 1998 campaign contributions *KentuckyVotes.org – Sen. title: Ed Worley
